Bow.name: Polar Star
Bow.passive_description: Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG increased by {}%. After a Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits an opponent, 1 stack of Ashen Nightstar will be gained for 12s. When 1/2/3/4 stacks of Ashen Nightstar are present, ATK is increased by {}%. The stack of Ashen Nightstar created by the Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst will be counted independently of the others.

Bow.name: Thundering Pulse
Bow.passive_description: Increases ATK by {}% and grants the might of the Thunder Emblem. At stack levels 1/2/3, the Thunder Emblem increases Normal Attack DMG by {}%. The character will obtain 1 stack of Thunder Emblem in each of the following scenarios: Normal Attack deals DMG (stack lasts 5s), casting Elemental Skill (stack lasts 10s); Energy is less than 100% (stack disappears when Energy is full). Each stack's duration is calculated independently.

Bow.name: Amos' Bow
Bow.passive_description: Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by {}%. After a Normal or Charged Attack is fired, DMG dealt increases by a further {}% every 0.1 seconds the arrow is in the air for up to 5 times.

Bow.name: Elegy for the End
Bow.passive_description: A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases Elemental Mastery by {}. When the Elemental Skills or Elemental Bursts of the character wielding this weapon hit opponents, that character gains a Sigil of Remembrance. This effect can be triggered once every 0.2s and can be triggered even if said character is not on the field. When you possess 4 Sigils of Remembrance, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain the "Millennial Movement: Farewell Song" effect for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Farewell Song" increases Elemental Mastery by {} and increases ATK by {}%. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Remembrance for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.

Bow.name: Skyward Harp
Bow.passive_description: Increases CRIT DMG by {}%. Hits have a {}% chance to inflict a small AoE attack, dealing 125% Physical ATK DMG. Can only occur once every {}s.

Bow.name: Compound Bow
Bow.passive_description: Normal Attack and Charged Attack hits increase ATK by {}% and Normal ATK SPD by {}% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

Bow.name: The Viridescent Hunt
Bow.passive_description: Upon hit, Normal and Aimed Shot Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding opponents, dealing {}% of ATK as DMG to these opponents every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every {}s.

Bow.name: Prototype Crescent
Bow.passive_description: Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by {}% for 10s.

Bow.name: Hamayumi
Bow.passive_description: Increases Normal Attack DMG by {}% and Charged Attack DMG by {}%. When the equipping character's Energy reaches 100%, this effect is increased by 100%.

Bow.name: Mitternachts Waltz
Bow.passive_description: Normal Attack hits on opponents increase Elemental Skill DMG by {}% for 5s. Elemental Skill hits on opponents increase Normal Attack DMG by {}% for 5s.

Bow.name: Windblume Ode
Bow.passive_description: After using an Elemental Skill, receive a boon from the ancient wish of the Windblume, increasing ATK by {}% for 6s.

Bow.name: Alley Hunter
Bow.passive_description: While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by {}% every second up to a max of {}%. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by {}% per second until it reaches 0%.

Bow.name: Blackcliff Warbow
Bow.passive_description: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by {}% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Bow.name: Favonius Warbow
Bow.passive_description: CRIT hits have a {}% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every {}s.

Bow.name: Sacrificial Bow
Bow.passive_description: After dealing damage to an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a {}% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every {}s.

Bow.name: The Stringless
Bow.passive_description: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by {}%.

Bow.name: Rust
Bow.passive_description: Increases Normal Attack DMG by {}% but decreases Charged Attack DMG by 10%.

Bow.name: Royal Bow
Bow.passive_description: Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by {}%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.

Catalyst.name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
Catalyst.passive_description: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, gain an {}% Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.

Catalyst.name: Skyward Atlas
Catalyst.passive_description: Increases Elemental DMG Bonus by {}%. Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to earn the favor of the clouds. which actively seek out nearby opponents to attack for 15s, dealing {}% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 30s.

Catalyst.name: Memory of Dust
Catalyst.passive_description: Increases Shield Strength by {}%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by {}% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

Catalyst.name: Everlasting Moonglow
Catalyst.passive_description: Healing Bonus increased by {}%, Normal Attack DMG is increased by {}% of the Max HP of the character equipping this weapon. For 12s after using an Elemental Burst, Normal Attacks that hit opponents will restore 0.6 Energy. Energy can be restored this way once every 0.1s.
Catalyst.weapon_asc_mat: Coral Branch of a Distant Sea

Catalyst.name: Mappa Mare
Catalyst.passive_description: Triggering an Elemental reaction grants a {}% Elemental DMG Bonus for 10s. Max 2 stacks.

Catalyst.name: Blackcliff Agate
Catalyst.passive_description: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by {}% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Catalyst.name: Royal Grimoire
Catalyst.passive_description: Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by {}%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.

Catalyst.name: Sacrificial Fragments
Catalyst.passive_description: After dealing damage to an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a {}% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every {}s.

Catalyst.name: Solar Pearl
Catalyst.passive_description: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by {}% for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by {}% for 6s.

Catalyst.name: The Widsith
Catalyst.passive_description:
When a character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s.
Recitative: ATK is increased by {}%.
Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by {}%.
Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by {}.

Catalyst.name: Hakushin Ring
Catalyst.passive_description: After the character equipped with this weapon triggers an Electro elemental reaction, nearby party members of an Elemental Type involved in the elemental reaction receive a {}% Elemental DMG Bonus for their element, lasting 6s. Elemental Bonuses gained in this way cannot be stacked.
Catalyst.weapon_asc_mat: Coral Branch of a Distant Sea

Catalyst.name: Dodoco Tales
Catalyst.passive_description:
Normal Attack hits on opponents increase Charged Attack DMG by {}% for 6s.

Charged Attack hits on opponents increase ATK by {}% for 6s.

Catalyst.name: Favonius Codex
Catalyst.passive_description: CRIT hits have a {}% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every {}s.

Catalyst.name: Wine and Song
Catalyst.passive_description: Hitting an opponent with a Normal Attack decreases the Stamina consumption of Sprint or Alternate sprint by {}% for 5s. Additionally, using a Sprint or Alternate Sprint ability increases ATK by {}% for 5s.

Catalyst.name: Prototype Amber
Catalyst.passive_description: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates {} Energy every 2s for 6s. All party members will regenerate {}% HP every 2s for this duration.

Catalyst.name: Frostbearer
Catalyst.passive_description: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a {}% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing {}% AoE ATK DMG. Opponents affected by Cryo are dealt {}% ATK DMG instead by the icicle. Can only occur once every 10s.

Catalyst.name: Eye of Perception
Catalyst.passive_description: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing {}% ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between opponents a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every {}s.
